name: Chess Engine
summary: Learn about .ENG files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: ENG files used by Fritz must be stored in \Program Files\ChessBase\Engines.

description: Chess engine used by various chess games; contains functions and algorithms used by the computer to play against a user; chess engines may be updated or added to a chess program to provide new types of computer players.
